mean_cn: n. 疑虑；  vt. 担忧，使…疑虑，害怕（misgive的变形）
mean_en: a feeling of doubt about something :a feeling that something might not be right or might not work as planned
short_phrase: have misgivings about sth. on the phone
sentence: When I told him the deal, he said he had some misgivings--maybe he didn't want the deal at all.
sentence_trans: 当我告诉了他这笔交易，他说他有些疑虑——可能他根本就不想做这笔交易。
